about_the_game:
Return to the Cursed Kingdoms and venture outside the walls into the wilderness with twenty tracks of dark fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Ominous, eerie instruments and menacing metal guitars set the stage for spider attacks, terrifying trees, and an occasional rest at the campfire. Be sure to post a guard, though. You never know what's lurking in the night. Also includes fifteen music events to punctuate important moments!

Features:

- 20 music tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, themes and towns!
- 15 ME Musical Events for short dramatic moments!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.

Tracklist:

Battle - Bug Swatter
Battle - Spider Slayer
Battle - Tree Cutter
Battle - Weed Killer
Battle - Wood Chipper
Dungeon - Blighted Ground
Dungeon - Corrupted Glade
Dungeon - Spider Nest
Dungeon - Thorn Maze
Dungeon - Unmarked Pathway
Theme - Bandit King
Theme - Evil Oak Lord
Theme - Queen Of Webs
Theme - Twisted Forest
Theme - What Once Was
Town - Abandoned Cabin
Town - Bandit Hideout
Town - Campfire Tales
Town - Ramshackle Outpost
Town - Scattered Survivors

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
